duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with administrative support, organizational projects, and protocol writing.
Participate in marketing projects and social media management, including strategy, copywriting, and design.
Contribute to human resources projects and business development initiatives.
Engage in big-idea brainstorming, problem-solving, and protocol writing.

education_certification.credential: Student or recent graduate interested in learning, collaborating, and thriving in a family-owned firm
